definitions.definition: A cramp iron inserted into a cavity in order to lift heavy stones; used as a symbol of strength in Freemasonry .
The son of a Freemason , envisaged as assisting his father in heavy work or in old age.
A kind of shears used in cropping woollen cloth .

main_definition: A cramp iron inserted into a cavity in order to lift heavy stones; used as a symbol of strength in Freemasonry .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , figurative ) The son of a Freemason , envisaged as assisting his father in heavy work or in old age.
A kind of shears used in cropping woollen cloth .
